title: Shih-Tzu Puppy Adventures
description: Cute and cuddly, from birth to death, Shih-Tzu puppies attract the attention of people in all walks of life. This compilation of stories, although fiction, could depict your favorite Shih-Tzu litter. Named after real people, Alexis, Pearl, Oakley, Rosalie, Lily, and Navy Shih-Tzu (Sheet Zoo) are born in a warm cozy kitchen but find themselves orphaned the next day. Why doesnâ€™t God answer our prayers and other questions are addressed in this series for children aged 2 on up.With lots of pictures, the Shih-Tzus have a world of adventures as they learn to trust people and discover the world around them before finding their own homes
author: Barbara Ann Derksen
